text: Saint-Rigomer-des-Bois is a former commune. It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Sarthe department in the west of France. Since 2015, it became a part of Villeneuve-en-Perseigne.Arrêté préfectoral 22 September 2014 == References == Category:Former communes in Sarthe
title: Saint-Rigomer-des-Bois
